Then, she saw it again. Téa's pink purse, right at the other side of the wall she was leaning against, just next to her.
"It's Téa purse. Maybe it will help me to understand what's going on ..."

Inside Téa's purse ...

113111123.content:
" What is this ?"
Serenity asked herself as she picked the dark greyish thing in Téa's purse.
She identified the object soon after.
Aside of some money, ID cards and such, the brunette's purse hasn't much items in it but this strange looking camera and ... some condoms.
" Oh..." Serenity blushed at her discovery...
Nobody bring condoms in his stuff without reasons.
If Téa went around with these in her handbag, it at least means she might planned to used them.
And there were about a good dozen of these condoms... and not particularly small size, furthermore...
Serenity never thought about that, but she didn't imagined Téa to be really "active" sexually.
The fact that her purse had a good number of XXL size condom made her feel awkward...
She was a bit curious about it, but in the end, Serenity didn't want to know more about that.

Instead she took a look at the strangely designed camera, Téa still showering, unaware of Serenity's presence right in the corner.
The camera looked like it came from another futuristic dimension, quite shining like a clean metal under the sunlight a showing very thing aesthetic detailed on the side and some inscriptions in a language she didn't recognized.

- That's a strange looking camera..., thought the young girl.

Turning the camera around and over, Serenity involuntarily clicked on something.
Doing so, the screen in the back-side of the camera lighten up, and shows what was looking like a gallery of thumbnails of saved photos.

Not stopping herself in her tracks, the girl tapped with the tip of her finger in one of the thumbnail randomly.
The photo now displayed on the screen showed a selfie of Téa, probably in her house and in her casual blue sleeveless shirt and blue mid-thigh short.
The photo was taken apparently some month ago, considering the date displayed in the bottom right of the photo.
The photo was displaying an appearance of Téa that Serenity recognized far more than the really busty brunette that was washing herself a few meters behind that wall she was against.
In this picture, Téa's breasts were at the size Serenity really remembered they were, a good C-cup, but just a C-cup, nothing more.
- So it wasn't my imagination.

Serenity continued to look at the gallery, and soon after some pair of photo of Téa or random landscape, she got puzzled and surprised by the photos that was about to follow.
- What the hell ?..., mumbled Serenity, awkwardly at was she was seeing.
The next photos were photos of random women, but with an obvious focus on their bust part. Photos taken apparently of random women on the street, but also on fitting room and even on public shower of some swimming pool, and after a quick analysis, from this exact swimming pool the 2 girls were in right now.
Photos after photos, it was only a stream of women boobs, random boobs, mostly big boobs, and even... Serenity couldn't believed it... photos of huge boobs of some Adult Magazine front page.
- What are these ? Why ?...
The whole gallery would have put a voyeur ashamed, and Serenity was trying to figured out what were all these photo and more specifically, why Téa had such photos in this camera.
Was her friend a secretly breast-obsessed weirdo taking photos of women's breasts secretly for some unconfessed reasons ?...
But it was only after a couple of another type of photo that she stopped.
- Oh god !...
She dropped the camera as a reflex as she saw a close-up photo of a trimmed vagina mildly open.
Maybe Téa's vagina, maybe some other woman's vagina from a porn magazine... Serenity didn't want to know.
Serenity was more confused than ever.
After saying this indecent photo gallery on Téa's camera, lot of dirty and impure images invited themselves in the young girl's mind that she would have prefer to not have.

*clang*
The drop of the camera on the cold floor of the swimming pool's shower room made a noise of metal that came to Téa's ears.

- Uh ?!.... let out Téa, turning her head in the direction of the noise's source.
She thought she was alone there, unaware of her little friend Serenity spying on her, but now, she wasn't that sure of that.

- Is there someone ? asked timidly Téa. She started to have a bad feeling of being observed and so start to slowly walk into the small wall in the corner where she hear the sound of a dropped object.

- Oh, damn, damn damn..., exclaimed to herself Serenity, realizing her clumsiness will made her spotted.
In panic of being caught searching in the other brunette personal stuff, Serenity quickly closed Téa's purse, before noticing that she forgot to put the camera, who slipped and fell half a meter away, in the purse.
But Téa's steps were coming closer and closer, so the young girl didn't took the time to put it in its place inside the purse and instead grabbed it with her left hand and run away in the opposite direction and outside of the room as fast as she could.

When Téa turned around the corner and noticed her purse on the floor, she started to think the noise might have been this purse falling on the ground.
Though, she hear the sound of some bare feet quickly running away.

- Hm ?... The young busty brunette was getting suspicious, but decided to forget about it, and went back under the shower to finish washing herself.
- Nevermind...

Outside, Serenity was panting, and sweating, from her intense rush to not get spotted by Téa.
Near the parking lot, Tristan, sit on his motorbike, waved his hand to the girl.
- "Hey ! What took you so long ? Are you coming or what ?"
- Oh ! Yeah, yeah, sorry... I was a bit... interrupted...in the cloakroom..., apologized the girl
- Really ?.. Well, come back here now. I'll drive you home., said the impatient tall boy, wanting to move on something else.
Serenity nodded.
She took a look at the camera, Téa's strange camera that she just appeared to steal, in her hand, her mind full of questions.
- I may took a further look at this things ...This is really weird...
She then put it on a pocket and ran to Tristan...

The young girl's evening will be filled with questions and inquiries...

1133.content:
"I use a Polymerization card to fuse my Forgiving Maiden monster with Marie the Fallen One to create the mighty and valiant Saint Joan !!"
"Aaah no ! You fooled me, I didn't expect that at all ! This monster is damn too powerful for my Lava Battleguard !" Tristan Taylor said, surprised by his opponent tactical move.
In front of him, Serenity giggled, "And that's not all. Now I equip Saint Joan with the magic card 'Cestus of Dagla' which increase her ATK by 500 points, pushing it to 3300 !".
Serenity spent lot of time with Tristan, Joey's old friend, since she had left hospital after the operations that saved her eyes, many months ago. It was clear that Joey's over-protected sister appealed very much to Tristan and he didn't particularly hide it. Therefore, the boy often paid visit to her, sometimes taking advantage of meeting her brother to go see her.

Serenity was a girl incredibly sweet, compassionate and very beautiful but also terribly timid, shy and reserved. Due to her temperament, but also her grave disease that made her spend most of her childhood in hospital, far from her brother, she sadly didn't have many much friends.
After her surgery, she met Joey's comrades with which she quickly made friends with. And among them, she found more especially a really attached and touching friend in the person of Tristan, Joey's longest time friend but also the person who first came to support her, after her brother and when this latter had to go away to Battle City tournament, only a little time after the
beginning of the surgery operation to cure her disease.

In this way, these 2 people eventually found each other quite naturally.
It was, however, not sure that Serenity shared the same feelings towards Tristan, who had towards her more than just an honest feeling of friendship. It must be said that the young, cute and charming Serenity didn't left many males indifferent. Except maybe Bakura or Yugi.
But the first was too difficult to grasp anyway and the girls seemed not to be his first preoccupation, far from it. As for the second, Yugi, despite being so friendly, he seemed so impervious to more than just kind love.
And between Téa Gardner, Rebecca Hawkins and Vivian Wong, the poor boy was out of reach anyway. He had already
well enough "candidates" (whether or not he actually knew that) to have to worry about one more girl.

So, Tristan wasn't the only one to have deeper feelings for Joey's little sister. The famous Duke Devlin, creator of Dungeon Dice Monster and friend of Yugi and the others, also showed affection for her and didn't hide it too.

"Euhm....Well... It looks like you win...", said Tristan embarassed.
Once again, he lost at Duel Monsters against Serenity, even though she wasn't the greatest duellist ever.
Happy, Serenity laughed with her cute voice.
"Hihi ! I beat you again, Tristan !"
Tristan faked indifference, but he was still a little bored to loose against a novice. It didn't affect him that much, but his ego always felt hurt everytime it happened. He was definitively not very skilled at this game. But Serenity natural naivety play in his favour. Pretty often, the girl thought that Tristan was loosing on purpose, only to made her happy.
The boy having a great sense of sacrifice, it wouldn't have been false if he wasn't just really bad to produce efficient strategies to win.

Smiling at him, she said :
"You want to play another game, Tristan, or do something else ?"
1133.title: Something else ...

11331.content:
Tristan remembered Serenity had a medical appointment.
Her eyesight was now fully repaired from the successfull surgery, but she had to follow regular check-up during an entire year at the hospital to be sure her condition or visual acuteness didn't deteriorate.or didn't present defect due to surgery flaw.
Tristan was bored of playing. He didn't want to loose anymore anyway...

"Don't you have your appointment at the hospital ?", he asked seriously.

Serenity completely forgot about it.
"Oh ! You're right ! I must meet Dr. Sanaka to check my eyesight today at 14:00 !"
Genzo Sanaka was a nice and very quiet man in his forties and also the main doctor in charge of Serenity's case following her since the very start of her eye surgery and until the final end of the operations, which included the briefs check-up appointment she had to follow 4 times in the year to ensure nothing went wrong before putting a successful end to this.
Dr. Sanaka was a really gentle man and the kind of comforting doctor you would easily trust in.
He was very experienced, spoke with a calm and deep soft voice, and was always there to reassured Serenity, even for the hardest times of her medical treatment. He was also a man of wisdom with always the good words to help people.
But if there was something that annoy Genzo Sanaka, it was people late. Punctuality was a life mantra for the doctor, and as nice as the doctor had always been with Serenity Wheeler, she didn't want to disappoint him.

Tristan looked at the clock on the wall behind Serenity, it was saying 13:24.
"It's nearly 13:30. If we go now, we could be there just in time."
"Then, hurry up, let's go !", she said with enthusiast.
11331.title: Maybe we should go to your check-up appointment...

113311.content:
Tristan looked at his watch, 13:57.
"Just in time !", he said to Serenity as they got out of his motorbike.

The girl climbed the few steps under the porch with quick strides and enter the Hospital.
Serenity then talked to the receptionist, a young good looking woman :
"Good afternoon. I come for an appointment with the doctor Genzo Sanaka."

The woman raised her head from the desk to see the young girl followed by the tall Tristan.
"Doctor Sanaka and his team should be at his office. I will let him know of your arrival ..."
She then grabbed the telephone at her right and dialed.
Right at this moment, a man in white coat at a size a little smaller than average, with soft wrinkles and dark wings under his eyes that many years couldn't hide anymore came from a nearby hallway right at Serenity and Tristan's left.
It was Dr. Sanaka, followed by his team of surgeon and medics, the Dr. Watanabe, a young skinny and gloomy-looking raven hair guy, Dr. Ring a tall sandy blond australian woman and Dr. Fushida, a smaller yet voluptuous woman and also a nice confidant for Serenity.

"No need to call, lady. I'm here.", Sanaka said in a gentle voice.

"Hi doctor !" said Serenity giving him a nice smile.
"Hello, Serenity ! 14 o'clock. You arrived exactly on time. You changed your habits.", teased the doctor.
The girl laughed, a little embarrassed.
"Who's that tall young man with you ? I don't remember we met before." he added, looking at Tristan.
"It's Tristan. He's my best friend !" Serenity answered with enthusiasm.
Tristan blushed for a second. If he expected her to present him as a friend, he was quite surprised to be presented as her best one. Nicely surprised in fact ...
"I see ... Good afternoon young man. It's always comforting to see that brave lady in good company.". He then shook hands with the boy.
"Good afternoon doctor."

"Well, we shouldn't waste time. Could you follow me please Serenity ?"
"Sure doctor." answered the girl.
"I'll borrow you that charming lady, if that's alright with you." Sanaka asked politely to Tristan.
"Of course, no problem at all. I'll wait just here !" the boy answered.
"Thank you."
"It won't be long Tristan. I'll come back quick.", said Serenity, before turning back and disappearing in the hallway with the doctor, followed by the 3 other doctors.
113311.title: At the hospital ...

1133111.content:
Dr Genzo Sanaka's office was simple 10 meters (~32 ft) by 6 meters (~20 ft) room with a wood desk, a pair of bookcase full of books, a few flowerpots, some surrealist painting on walls, the owner certificates, naturally, 3 comfortable leather chairs (2 for visitors) and some floor lamp. The wall behind the doctor was actually a full length glass givin a nice view of South side of the city.

"The doctors are checking the imaging results of your cornea. It shouldn't take long, just as usual. But I don't think we'll have bad surprises. You seems very well." explained Sanaka to Serenity, standing stoic on her chair.

"Meanwhile ..." the doctor started to rummage on a stack of papers on his left in his desk, and on some drawers,
"I would like you to answer me some questions. Nothing complicated, just the regular things...."

Dr. Sanaka began to asked her formal routinely simple questions that she answered quickly, mainly about any visual effects she could have experienced, any form of nausea, unusual tiredness in the eyes or difficulties to see at long or very close distances, etc ...

After 3 minutes, it looks like that once again, there was no problem to notify, without surprises actually.
The protocoles ended, Dr. Sanaka discussed with Serenity :
- So, Serenity. How have you been these last months ?
- Pretty nice ! I've a lot of fun recently since I'm on holidays.
- Haha, glad to hear you say that ! Did you make some friends since the surgery ? I know how it has been hard for you to keep relationship with your disease. Hopefully, all this is ended, that's what I hope everytime you come here for check-up, even though I feel that everything is okay. But I know the return to a normal life isn't easy when you spent so much time of your life in hospital. ", he said to her.
- And I don't say that because I spend my own life working in one of them." he added as a joke, smiling at her.

- Yes, I got many friends now, thanks to my brother. He's so nice with me. I'm so happy to have him. I don't know what I would be if he wasn't there ... I may have already talked to you about them. Yugi, Mai, Téa ... And also Duke !
- Oh yes ! Duke Devlin, right ? That young boy who created that game, the "Dungeon Rice Monster".
Serenity laughed,
- It's actually "Dungeon Dice Monster", doctor. And yes, it's him. There is also Tristan.
- That tall boy who is with you. You two look like very close, isn't it ?
- Yes. He's a close friend of my brother Joey, but he spend more time with me than with him now, actually.
She laughed again.
- I see. Are you two in a relationship ?
Serenity looked confused.
- In a relationship ? You mean, like lovers ?
- Yes. I could see quickly in his eyes that this boy seems to care for you. It wouldn't be surprising. You're a beautiful girl Serenity, and a very nice person too. It would be a surprise if a sweet girl like you doesn't already met a good boy."
The girl blushed and smile.
- Ahah. You're always so nice with me doctor. Tristan is so sweet with me, but I don't think he love me. Though, maybe ... maybe it would be nice if he does ... I don't know ... Tristan is a really nice guy. I like Tristan. But I think i'm not really his type of girl anyway. His room is full of posters, images and books of tall busty strong women."
Serenity started to look at her feet.
- Tristan is my best friend, and I think I'm just his friend too. I don't think there is anything more ...

Sanaka laughed.
- Ahah, you're so cute Serenity. You make me think of my niece. She's a very beautiful young woman, and attract a lot of boys. But she's completely oblivious of it, and most of those poor boys won't even dare to try.
You were physically blind before, but it seems you're still a little when it came to boy, uh ?
The doctor gave her a wink and added.
- Women can be complicated, but so can be boy too. Don't make too quick conclusion on boys feelings. They're proud, Tristan probably is, and they won't share easily their feelings when it come to deep emotions. But I'm sure you would be surprised if you asked him.
Serenity blushed again, not saying a word.
- Boys like and dream of big star girls, but they also love sweet and polite girl like you. Never doubt of it.

They exchanged smiles, silently... Then, he added.
- Oh, that made me think ... We still have this excess money your brother Joey gave us to pay your surgery ! I nearly forgot to talk you about it.
- Oh yes, those ¥3,000,000 [an : About $27,959 US] he win at the Pegasus' Duelist Kingdom Tournament ! I think Joey overestimate the price of the surgery, ahah. Even though, it was still expensive ...
- "Yes, you're right. The money he gave us by the time was frankly too much ! I don't know what people have in mind, but, as expensive surgery can be, it's never as expensive as ¥3,000,000, even for experimental operations, thanks god !"
He laughed.
- Anyway, we don't know what to do of this nearly ¥2,500,000 remaining. Your brother Joey told us that it was entirely your money now. So it's up to you. But we can't kept that money. Unless you want to invest your money here, of course.

- I don't know what to do of all this money..., Serenity said.
- It's okay, no pressure. Just to let you know that we don't want to keep all this money your brother gave us by mistake that is entirely yours in the first place. Just ... think about it and tell me what we have to do with it, if we send you back all of it or if you want to make a donation or something to this hospital. Either way, there is no problem my sweet lady.

Serenity seemed lost in thought ...

- Well ! Let's go see doctors Watanabe, Ring and Fushida to check those images results of your eyes now. Maybe we can give you some as souvenirs.

113311111.content:
Dr Sanaka left the room with Dr. Hisato Watanabe and directly turned left on this level's hospital corridor, not visible anymore from here.

Serenity turned her sight to the 2 remainings doctors, Fushida and Ring, visibly having an argument.
Both women were tough, independent, strong and intelligent women, but they were different on many aspect in personality, and also an appearance.

Doctor Sarah Ring was a young "prodigy" doctor from Australia, only having 25 years old (which is really young for an expert surgeon with many other hat in other medical fields) and also with many charms.
Naturally tall, topping at 1m80 (~5 ft 11 inch), dirty blond hair on ponytail, a nice subtle tan, long firm legs, bright emerald eyes, a slender "haute couture" model body, and a cold but charming (in a femme fatale way) face, the only things she would have naturally lacked was a modest set of discrete B cup breasts.
But not being afraid of self-modification, she put herself breasts implants pushing their size to a more generous D cup a couple of years ago.
Right after being graduated top of the class of a rich and famous private school of medicine, she got opportunity of a very well-paid job in Japan and moved on to work on Dr. Sanaka's team.
Sarah Ring was very bright and knew it perfectly. A good confidence on her capacities which lead her to be quite arrogant and despising with whoever not as talented as her. Having being raised by a strict demanding father, without any mother, on a rich respected family she grew pretty tough and got a hard but stubborn character. Tact wasn't a thing she mastered at all.
On many aspects, Sarah Ring could be seen as an arrogant bitch, but an intelligent and far from stupid one, and while she wasn't very pleasant with barely anyone, she wasn't also a fundamentally evil person. Maybe someone who missed some real daddy love from a very demanding father at a time.

Doctor Asuka Fushida, in the opposite, was a more natural beauty, less sophisticated but drawing a more simple and kind appearance. A kind appearance matching with her very sweet and kind character (just like an older Serenity, but with a more motherly figure). Asuka Fushida was way smaller than Sarah, topping at 1m55 (~5 ft 1 inch), but she had nothing to envy of her (she wasn't an envious person to begin with). Her breasts, unlike Dr. Ring, of a big amazing DD cup size, were all naturals.
Both doctors were aware of that. And maybe Dr. Ring had an unassumed jealousy for that, as Asuka Fushida's breasts looked pretty amazing on her petite frame and made people consider she has been really lucky with Nature on this (even more when considering japaneses women average breast size isn't great to begin with).
Asuka Fushida, unlike Sarah Ring, came from a modest but caring family and had being raise with high values of respect and love of family, friends and other people. That's why she always wanted to be a doctor. She never had the chance to be graduated from a famous or private school, but she still was very competent and talented. A little older than her colleague, being 27 years old, she was also noticeably more experienced, with more social skills for sure, but not only. Even though Sarah's skills was irrefutable, her obstinate, nervous and irritable nature made the differences on occasions, against Asuka's calm and cold-nerves, and to brings solutions. Dr. Fushida was a motherly figure. She loved and cared about children above anything else. She was a reassuring presence, and an always calm and optimistic woman.
And she probably was Dr. Sanaka's favorite assistant (which brought even more envy from Dr. Ring who hated to not be on the spotlight, not being "the one", or the best).
Asuka was a charming lady with lovely clear blue eyes, beautiful and long shining raven black hair as soft as silk, and a nice hourglass figure. She wasn't as fit as Sarah, but got a nicer rack and more generous and sexy booty.
But of all her features, the most appealing one was still her angelic and appeasing smile that would calmed even the angry Cerberus of Hell.


Serenity came closer to the 2 women, hearing more of what they were talking about.
Dr. Fushida : Come on ! Don't bring this up, this is stupid !
Dr. Ring : Oh well sure. That's so easy to say for you ! You don't know what it is. You never knew what it is !
Dr. Fushida : Sarah, this is so stupid, a smart girl like you should know it...
Dr. Ring : Don't start patronizing me and talking like you know shit, miss Perfect. Looks matter, they always mattered, nowadays more than ever.
Any coin spend to improve figures are well spend. If I had these money, I won't hesitate to use it for myself... as in investment.
Dr. Fushida : There are investments worthing far more than your own little body, Sarah. Wasting and spending on stupid breast implants are probably one of the worst way you could use such amount of money. This is silly. Breasts aren't everything.

Asuka Fushida kept silenced for a couple of second.
Dr. Fushida : .... Well, I really feel sorry for you Sarah. If you feel so insecure that the very first thing you will do with ¥2,500,000 is spending it to enhance your own physical figure and especially your breasts, i'm really sorry for you ...
Dr. Ring : Hmpf, so nice of you, but I don't need your sympathie or compassion ...

Serenity then interrupted a cold exchange of threat sight between the 2 women :

Dr. Fushida turn her sight to her left, swapping her upset expression to a kind and warming smile.

Dr. Ring then shouted at Asuka :
- This isn't nothing. We're talking about damn millions of Yen. Don't act like this isn't important. This is important !

- "Millions of Yens ?", asked Serenity shyly, "Are you talking about my brother's money ?"

- "Yes, we are, sweety", answered Sarah Ring, still looking at Dr. Fushida with a hard and cold expression, "But the great miss Asuka Fushida, the Saint, probably think you better just throw all of it for some bullshit unicorns and fairies defense association than just make the best of it for yourself !"

A weak smile tries to get through to Asuka's face, but it can't quite get there. Resigned, she sits down.
- "Well, I...I still don't quite know what to do with all of the money, Dr...a-and I was...wanting to ask you what I should use it on?"
Fushida stands up, and the smile finally breaks through as she motions for Serenity to move in closer.

- "Well, do you have any ideas for what could be needed? Remember to take care of yourself and family first, of course."
- "No, my mother has always been able to take good care of me, and besides, Joey's already becoming an adult, so...I don't really think that he would need-er, well, would want my help a-anyways..."
Sighing, Fushida brings Serenity closer.
- "But what about yourself? After all, it is your money, has there been anything you've wanted recently?"
- "What would I have been able to see that I wanted before the surgery?"
Clasping a hand to her mouth, she steps back from Fushida
- "I-I-I'm so sorry! I-I didn't mean for it to come out like that, there-there's just that, uh, well, there's-"
Dr. Fushida stops her though, continuing her smile as she brings Serenity closer to her.
- "I know you meant nothing by that. After all, I don't think you could ever really mean to be harmful...in fact...I have a good idea of what the money could do for you."
- "W-What is it, then?"
- "Come with me, Serenity. I'll bring you and Tristan somewhere where you can get this. It's going to be a decently long ride, though."

Standing up, Fushida takes Serenity. She looks over at Dr. Ring, who is ignoring her completely, and she just turns around and continues to walk. Heading out, there's no sign of Watanabe or Sanaka. Still, the regular staff treat this without any confusion and continue on their job, until both of them get to the lobby. Tristan stands up, walking over to Serenity.

Tristan : "Alright, so are we good to go? And uh, who is this with you?"
Serenity : "Actually Tristan, I was hoping you'd be alright with us going for a bit of a ride. Dr. Fushida here says she has an idea for somewhere I could use the money."
Tristan : "Wait, what do you mean somewhere to use the money? She isn't bringing you to go gambling or anything, right?"
Dr. Fushida : "Ah, you must be Tristan...but no, I can assure you this place is nothing of the sort. Just a little ma and pa shop that I frequent. I think Serenity's going to love it, but of course you have the option to refuse."
Giving another of her smiles, Tristan seems to calm down and steps to Serenity's side.
Tristan : "Alright, but I'm warning you if this ends up putting Serenity in any sort of trouble, I'll be coming after you!"
Dr. Fushida : "And if there is any trouble, I'll let you do just that."
Her smile almost seems to gleam at Tristan when she says it, closing her eyes for a moment as the three of them begin to walk off. Fushida leads the way, and it doesn't take long for Tristan's eyes to avert downward. Watching as Fushida's bouncing behind goes back and forth with each step, giving a rhythm to a non-existent song. After a few seconds of watching this, it almost becomes a type of hypnotizing, emphasized by when they make it outside. He does manage to snap out of it though once the sunlight begins beating down on him.

"Just about there, aaaand here's our ride!"
Dr. Fushida stops just in front of a modest-sized car, nothing too big, but nothing too stereotypical for her based on her height either. Walking past as Fushida gets in, Tristan holds open the passenger door. Serenity gets in, giving a quick thanks to Tristan before he gets in the backseat.

"Now, I must tell you before we go that the owners are quite a bit...eccentric, so to speak."
"How do you know so much about this place? I get that it's a small store but you seem oddly intimate with the details."
"Well, I have my reasons to knowing about it..."

The ride begun, and after a few minutes they pull up. The sign out front reading "HFA Store: Healing For All" looks completely outdated, a faded wood that has seemed to be forgotten to time as indicated by the vines covering its corners and bottom. The building itself however seems to be top-of-the-line, as if it was just built a week ago. Still, they head inside. A bell chimes, sounding straight from an elderly bell tower, and the lights brighten up as from behind the counter, a duo spring to their feet.

"HI HI! Welcome to-"
"Wait, is that you, Asuka? How long has it been, a few weeks? It seems like the healing water has been helping you, you look even younger than before!"
"Aw, please stop. It hasn't done that well...although it is a bit easier to move around."
"Well who's your friend there?"
"That's Serenity. Serenity, meet Kairi and Hiroshi Fushida, aka my mom and dad!"

Dr Sanaka left the room with Dr. Asuka Fushida and directly turned left on this level's hospital corridor, from where they weren't visible anymore.

Serenity turned her sight to the 2 remainings doctors, Watanabe and Ring, visibly having quite an argument.

- AHah! Jesus, you're such a creepy weirdo, Watanabe!, Serenity could heard some sarcasm coming from Dr. Sarah Ring.

Ring was a tough, independent, strong and intelligent woman, but also very stubborn and not particularly delicate with other human being, especially with those who dared opposing her opinions.

Doctor Sarah Ring was a young "prodigy" doctor from Australia, only having 25 years old (which is really young for an expert surgeon with many other hat in other medical fields) and also with many charms.
Naturally tall, topping at 1m80 (~5 ft 11 inch), dirty blond hair on ponytail, a nice subtle tan, long firm legs, bright emerald eyes, a slender "haute couture" model body, and a cold but charming (in a femme fatale way) face, the only things she would have naturally lacked was a modest set of discrete B cup breasts.

Having being raised by a strict demanding father, without any mother, on a rich respected family she grew pretty tough and got a hard but stubborn character. Tact wasn't a thing she mastered at all.
On many aspects, Sarah Ring could be seen as an arrogant bitch, but an intelligent and far from stupid one, and while she wasn't very pleasant with barely anyone, she wasn't also a fundamentally evil person. Maybe someone who missed some real daddy love from a very demanding father at a time.

Doctor Hisato Watanabe, as for him, was far less a glamorous and shiny person, quite the opposite actually. If Dr. Ring was the kind of pretentious full of self-confidence little genius who like to remind everyone her intellectual superiority, Watanabe, on the contrary, was a very discreet person, kind of socially awkward nerdy guy.
He never show-off his intellectuel, not because he was less skilled than his colleagues.

Dr. Hisato Watanabe always looked like he was on the edge of depression.
Maybe he was ? It was hard to tell as his face was so expressionless.

He really loved his little bugs.

I just need money ... and test subject... I'm sure this young girl would understand.

Dr. Ring did the same, and with a smirk, told the young girl.
- Nothing my dear! Just a small talk between a brilliant mind and stupid delusional one in its delirium.
Watanabe looked at the tall australian doctor, frowning from the last sarcasm of an unending pile of sarcasm, not saying a word. He just sighed...
Serenity looked at the gloomy guy, and, sweet and kind as she was,suddenly had some pity for the sad-looking man.
She didn't know what all this was about, but she felt like this woman was unnecessarly rude with this man.
Looking at his natural sad-face, she felt like this guy maybe need some considerations.

- Oh... I see...
Just said the young girl.

Dr. Sarah Ring noticed that look on Serenity's eyes, and got circumspect about it.
<<Is she feeling some pity for that trash weirdo ?>> asked herself the tall blond, her eyebrow lifted, a skeptical look on her face.

Believes the progress of science is in insect... You know... "bugs", cockroach, gross spongy larva and such... Is that right, Watanabe ?
- ...

She decided to go talk a little more with them...

11431.content:
Rebecca saw a photo, probably made in the Ancient Egypt Museum, figuring the 7 Millenium relics.
She recognized the Millenium puzzle, the relic Yugi was always wearing around his neck.
Around the puzzle, there were the 6 other Millenium objects, the Eye, the Ring (that she saw once in Bakura's hands), the Rod, the Scale, the Key and the Necklace (which she knew Ishizu Ishtar had owned).

While she didn't actually saw all of them for real, she knew Yugi and his team encountered people possessing them.

She looked at the photo, remembering the story around them, the powerful relics made by Aknadin, the high priest of the Pharaoh Aknamkanon, very long time ago. All of them giving powerful abilities to whom would put their hands on them (if this person had the inner strength to handle it).
Ability to call the creepy Shadow Realms, but also abilities of reading someone's minds, controlling or even modeling it, abilities to see through peoples souls and sending them into the void if wanted...
Some of those items could also summoned monsters from the darkness and cast illusions to foul and trick people.

Rebecca, like many, had always wondered how such things could exist.
Magic was a real thing in this world, it couldn't be denied to whoever knew these items weren't just some old religious artifacts.
But it always puzzled the little blond-haired girl's mind.

How far could Magic went? Was it only about those specifics Millenium items? Were some powerful magics sleeping somewhere that could bend the reality itself?
Reasonably, she thought, if Magic was real, it might had expressed itself on other places or occasions in History.

And were there only 7 Millenium items built or were there some more that might have been forgotten?
It could be everywhere ... Solomon Muto found one of this rare items, then gave it to his son. Bakura got one too! And so did Ishizu...

Why didn't she own a Millenium item herself was one of the question she asked. After all, like Yugi, her own grandpa was an archeologist too... And a great one.
Why Solomon Muto was able to get his hands on the Millenium Puzzle while her grandfather didn't find anything alike, even though he searched through the ruins of Ancient Egypt way more than Yugi's grandfather ?

Maybe because of something relate to "destiny", she thought. That's what Yugi and some other people knowing the Millenium Items would have probably said.

Rebecca was really curious about these items and magic... But her thought were interrupted when a discreet white-haired boy entered the Game Shop and immediately engaged her.

"They aren't there anymore.", the boy said.
Rebecca jumped with surprised and turned back to note him.

"Oh ! Hi Bakura !", she said with a smile, recognizing the calm mysterious guy.

"Hi Rebecca", he responded quietly, then looking back at the photo.

"So you're interested in the Millenium items ?"
"Who wouldn't ?", answered Rebecca, "I was wondering what could do Magic... you know... Are those items unique, or are they other things like these in our planet ?"

"You mean, like... other Millenium items ?", Bakura asked.
"Yes."
"Well ... ", Bakura paused seemingly lost in his thoughts, "... You know, not many people know about those 7 items. And even less know that they weren't exactly 7 but, in fact, 8 as far as I know ... But maybe there are just even more than that ..."

Surprised, Rebecca was suddenly very interested about Bakura's speech.
"Really ? There exists another Millenium item ? How would nobody knows that but you ?", she asked suspicious.

"Yes... I'm the only one now to know that, well, now you too. Even Yugi doesn't have a clue of this.", he continued.
"Do you remember the evil spirit that was in me when I wore the Millenium ring ?"
Rebecca nodded.
"When the Millenium items were created, he was there, watching the pharaoh's priests created these powerful items in the darkness. The evil spirit told me everything about it and told me that there was another Millenium item."

"Go on! Tell me more !", the blond girl asked with a growing interest.

"It's called the Millenium Heart. It's supposed to be a very powerful item that was build using the same process as with the 7 others Millenium items, right after them."
Looking nowhere, eyes stuck into the void, Bakura considered not telling more about the Millenium heart to Rebecca but thought it couldn't do any harm.

any answer from her.
"Many thousand years ago, when Aknadin traveled to the village of Kul Elna, he and his army slaughtered the entire
village, and used people to create 7 magic items for his pharaoh in order to protect Egypt of greater threats.
The process of creation induced melting flesh of these people, their bones, their blood, theirs souls ... with liquefied gold and powerful sorcery.
That day, a big number of life ended. Sure, Kul Elna was inhabited only by bad people, thieves, dishonest human beings and murderers, but it was still a horrible butchery..."

Bakura paused again, remembering the story his dark side told him.

"Nearly everybody in the village died this day... But not that evil spirit that would haunted me thousands of year later.
He told me he survived and that, from that day, his mind was filled with hatred, rage, and revenge.
He wanted so hard to kill the pharaoh, his army, and everybody he loved.
What people don't know is that 'Thief King' knew how Aknadin and his priests made the Millenium items.
And in order to get his revenge, he decided to try to made one himself."

"But how could he made it ? He couldn't kill an entire village himself as well to got the material, right ?", cut off Rebecca.

"You think he couldn't find that much people to slaughter for his plan of creating his own Millenium item ? ...", he answered.
"Well, in fact, yes, you might be right. But he didn't actually need to murdered anybody anyway. Kul Elna was indeed a small village, but, at the time, it numbered nearly 2 to 3 hundred inhabitants.
If 99 bodies were only used to create the 7 first items, the evil spirit, the 'Thief King', had at his disposal many others corpse of murdered people still right there, left there streaked with blood by Aknadin and his soldiers...
And he wasn't called 'Thief King' for nothing. He had gold... Tons of it...
Thus, It wasn't that much difficult for him to re-use the same process the high priest did to create another last Millenium item.
An evil and corrupted secret magic item that nobody would know about..."

"The Millenium Heart ...", whispered Rebecca, with a dreamy tone.

"Yes, the Millenium Heart ... 'Thief King' created it with the purpose to destroy everything...
Though, 'Thief King' was evil, powerful, but he wasn't a priest. And while he got the process of creation more or less right, he never succeed to create this item as he wanted to be.
The result was a magic item that could destroy many thing, but only physical things ...
To be more specific, the Millenium Heart could altered physical and living things, whether in an attempt to destroy its
integrity or to simply modifying it.", said Bakura.

"A Millenium item to change any living being ?", Rebecca asked him.

"Yes, more or less but only physically, and on limited effect. 'Thief King' wasn't skilled enough to make the Heart affect minds,
unlike any other Millenium item. Making it a Millenium item of a lesser power. The item was also unstable and unreliable.
While he could have used it to make some damage among the Pharaoh's army, he knew the Millenium Heart wasn't powerful enough to annihilate the pharaoh and his priests anyway and that it was no match for them.

He was very disappointing and didn't thought further of possible use of it. So he threw it away ... That was at this moment he thought of gathering the actual 7 other Millenium items, instead of creating his own, to reach his goal and get his revenge. After that, the Millenium Heart was forgotten, left behind by 'Thief King' itself...." ended Bakura.

"... And that is all ? ...", asked Rebecca, hungry for more information

"Yes, that is all !", answered Bakura with a big smile, back to a more joyful voice tone.

"So you are telling me that there is this Millenium Heart, just ... dropped or buried somewhere, and absolutely nobody give a single care of it and nobody found it all those years ?!", she asked, not believing it.
114311.title: Bakura enters the game shop ...

choices: Rebecca goes into his room by pretending she's here for homeworks to his mom
Rebecca  sneaks inside his room in the afternoon while he's away
1143112.content:
Bakura didn't know what to tell her.
She was right, thousands of year passed since the evil spirit dark Bakura left the Millenium Heart, and eventually someone did found it ... The dark side of Bakura itself found it actually. Thousands of year after he threw it away, he took it again. Though, he never actually make use of it, and didn't planned to, he wanted to keep it on his side this time, in order to prevent the Pharaoh Atem or his allies from finding it and using it against him.
Thus, the Millenium Heart was nowadays in Bakura's house, inside a small chest in his room.
A well-kept secret Bakura didn't want to reveal to anybody, obviously...

After a long silence, he finally answered Rebecca.
"Well, yes ... I mean probably ... I don't know ...", he said with a faltering voice.
If the dark Bakura was a good actor, the innocent and good Bakura was a terribly bad liar.

"You're sure you don't know where it is ? ...", asked the cute blond girl, suspicious.
She wasn't stupid, far from it. She could easily tell Bakura was lying or hiding something from her.

"Uh... Yeah, Rebecca, I swear ... I mean, if I knew where the Millenium Heart was, I would have told it to Yugi, you or the others, don't you think ?...", he said, not very convincingly.

"Well, until five minutes ago, nobody but you knew that there was a Millenium Heart in the first place ... You never told any of us there was another Millenium item anyway...", she answered back.

Bakura had to admit, she got a point there ...
"It's only because none of you had to know of its existence ..."
"Just like none of us have to know where it is, right ?", Rebecca said, giving him a teasing smile.

"Yes, you shouldn't know where it is ...", he blushed, embarrassed.

"Ha ! So you know where it is !", she shouted at him in victory, grinning as she thought she uncovered him and that she was about to knew the truth.

"No, that's not what I said !", Bakura blushed even more.
"Listen, even if I knew where it was, I wouldn't tell you. It's a Millenium Item, it's far too dangerous thing to deal with."

"Hey, listen Bakura, I'm a big girl !", she said proudly while standing on her tiptoe, a big smile on her face and giving a wink at him, "I'm not stupid. I'm a very smart, don't you remember ?"
She giggled.
"And I'm a serious woman, also. I'm not a kid, I'm mature enough to understand things !"

Bakura sighed.
"Well, maybe ... but still..."

"Is it in your house ?", the girl asked.
"What ?! Noo !", Bakura was startled. He didn't expect her to guess that the Millenium Heart was indeed in his house, in his bedroom, hidden inside a chest.
Rebecca, a big grin on her face, understanding she might have put a finger on something, leaned forward at him and say
"Ahaaaa... You sneaky boy... You have it but you don't want to tell me. I smell that you're lying to me !"
She giggled.
"No, I'm not lying. Stop making stupid assumptions. You're making yourself stories. I don't have the Millenium Heart. I don't know where it is ! I swear"
"But you look exactly like someone who know where it is. And I bet you have it. You're the only to knew about it, and where it was, and strangely, after 3000 years, nobody found it while the other Millenium items have all been found. And it's not like you said it was actually hidden somewhere, right ? What a chance nobody found it yet, isn't it ? Or maybe you have it, and keep it secret with you, explaining why nobody ever heard of it, right ?", she asked more and more suspicious.

"No, that's silly, Rebecca ! I don't have it..." Bakura's face was plain red.

"I can see through you, Bakura" she laughed. "You're a very bad liar."
She continued.
"So, if you don't have it, you don't see any problem that I check for it in your house then ? It could be somewhere there, uh ?", she teased him.

"No ! It's not in my bedroom ! Don't come near my bedroom !", he shouted out, embarrassed and in panic.

"Uh ? I never spoke about your bedroom ...", said Rebecca.
Bakura realized he just trapped himself.

"Uh, OK. Well. I've things to do ! I've to go, sorry ! See you soon Rebecca !", the poor white-haired boy said quickly in panic. Not wanting to spend any more second with the young blond american girl, he run away without any "goodbye".

"Hmmm... Yeah... See you soon Bakura.", whispered Rebecca.
If Bakura had the said Millenium Heart he spoke about, Rebecca thought she had to found out.
The boy nearly admit that he had it somewhere in his room.
The girl would like so much to see such a magic item, or having a Millenium item for herself too.

One way or another, she had to find out the truth. Rebecca thought about a way to go into Bakura's room and find if he really had the powerful Millenium item...
1143112.title: Bakura knows but don't want to tell to Rebe...

11431122.content:
The US blond girl pondered on it for a while.

She wasn't dishonest nor she was a thief, but her curiosity was too strong.
If something so mysterious and powerful was there, the brainiac girl had to find it !
Furthermore, she didn't planned to actually "steal" it, right ? She just wanted to see it for herself ...
"And I won't stay for too long, I will just check if Bakura's stories are right, nothing more. It's not really privacy infringement, is it ?", Rebecca said, arguing with herself and her guilt.

"Hmmm...", lost in her scheme, she also asked herself how she could just sneak in Bakura's bedroom.
She remembered his house configuration.
His bedroom wasn't in the first floor, unfortunately, but could be theoretically accessed by the single window on it.
She remembered his bedroom's window was poorly oriented so that it was actually in shadows of other building around the house and didn't filtered much light. A chance for her if she had to go through this way.
Thanksfully, she might not get noticed if she was discreet enough and tried to sneak in.

Still, she wasn't a ninja, nor an athlete, she was just about 5'2'' (1,55m) (unfortunately, just like with her chest, puberty didn't offered her more in this field) and didn't have a special set of skills in climbing and housebreaking...

She decided to move into Bakura's house to find out if there is any possibilities ...

Rebecca walked through streets and finally reached Bakura's house's district.

"Ah... So, here we are", she whispered.
Looking at the house scrupulously, many scheme entered her sharp mind.
"There are some high fir edge around the property. Too height for Bakura or his mother, but still are well maintained and trimmed.
Meaning there might be some stepladder or ladder somewhere I could use...Could be a good start... Hmmm"
She then remembered it by seeing it. There was a small tool shed just behind Bakura's bedroom's window.
It was her chance ! The window was about only 5 to 6 feet (~150/180cm) higher from the top of the shed.
Rebecca smiled, her answer was found.

It was at this moment someone came face to face to her.
(well, technically, face to neck, as the person standing right next to her was slightly taller)

"Hey ! Rebecca !"
Interrupting the blond girl thought, the unexpected voice startled her.
"Ah ! Ho hey, Téa !"
A nice smile on her face, her more or less secret rival (for Yugi's love) was standing right there.
"I didn't expect to see you around."
"Nor did I ..." thought Rebecca, embarrassed to have someone noticing her here... Furthermore if it was Téa Gardner, the japanese girl that not only made her having complex about her body but also was more or less (there was still some ambiguity about it) Yugi's childhood "girlfriend".

A nice slim slender frame, long toned legs, a nicely shaped butt with some hips and damned C-cup breasts emphasized by a small waist.
Her height 5'5" (1,65m), by 3 good inch (10 cm) taller than Rebecca was even higher with her 2" (5cm) wedge heel platform sandals.
So close from the blond girl, this whole 5"/15cm in height difference between the 2 girls made Téa nearly having her nice boobs surrounding/bumping Rebecca's neck.

It infuriated internally the younger blond girl.
Such (unintentional ?) provocation.

She has always been frustrated by the differences between Téa's body and her own.
Sure, at the time she was 12 and just met Yugi and the other, it was normal for her to be much less developed than the already "puberted" 16 years old Téa.
But now that Rebecca has pretty surely already ended her growing phases, she knew that in the end, Téa was still the biggest, the tallest, and the sexiest.
And she was pretty sure Téa knew it too, even if she didn't had to said it to make this fact visible.

Rebecca read many things, in books and in internet, and one of the things she was always told is that, US women was supposed to be way bigger than Japanese women in average.
As asian had the reputation of being more about slim, cute sweet looking, petite women never taller than 5'3' / 1,60m and never going much more than B cup, while USA was the said to be the country of stupidly over-developed (or surgically enhanced) women with curves and boobs to die for.

And there, as a cynical joke, there was her, the US blond chick :
5'2" (1,55m), barely a B-cup, flat ass
and ... there was Téa, the cute Japanese brunette :
5'5" (1,65m), a good C-cup (and nearly a D-cup), and nice firm bubble ass

"Aaarrr goddammit, that girl !...", was yelling deep inside Rebecca.

"So, what are you doing here ?" asked Téa.
"Oh heum nothing, I was going to Yugi's grandfather shop." the blond shamelessly lied.
"Uh, really ? You just came out from that street, it's the exact opposite way." said the brunette, looking Rebecca, interrogative.
"Ahah ! Oh yes. Silly me, I might have getting lost there.", the girl reacted, blaming herself to not had come with a better lie.

"Well, if you wanna go there, you can follow me. I was just heading there too. I've a date with Yugi." she said, smiling at her.
"What the hell ?! A date with Yugi ? Is she trying to provoke me ?!! Dammit, f*ck you bitch ! Aargh", thought Rebecca, not showing any sign of jealously or whatsoever.

"Ahah. Oh well, no thanks... I..uh...I've to check something before.. I'll catch you later ! Bye !" she answered clumsily, faking going away outside of Téa's sight.

"Uh ?..." Téa said, looking Rebecca stepping quickly and disappearing in the corner of the street.
"Ahah, she's so weird !", she giggled, not really unaware of what could hide the blond geek attitude.
The brunette then disappeared into the maze of Domino City suburban's streets.

"Hmm... damn Téa. Why the world has to always remind me of her existence when I don't need to ?", grumbled Rebecca as she went back to her initial position after making sure the brunette wasn't around anymore.

Back to her scheme, the blond didn't want to waste more time.
She awkwardly climbed Bakura's house's tool shed, not without some difficulties, and tried to jump to the windows that appeared to be opened in this hot summer.
"Goddammit !" Rebecca cursed as her small size, once more, was getting in the way of her plans.
"Uhn !... Uhnnnnggg!", she was trying desperately to reach with her small hands the edge of the windows.
It's only after 3 minutes and a lot of unsuccessful attempts that she finally grabbed the ledge.
"YES !" she thought.
Lifting with effort her corpse, she went through the windows and into Bakura's gloom bedroom.
11431122.title: Rebecca  sneaks inside his room in the afternoo...

choices: Rebecca notices golden dust recovering the clothes she had wrapped the item with
Rebecca accidentally touches the Millenium Heart
Decides to go on search on the internet to make the best use of the item
114311221.content:
"So, where the Millenium Heart could be ?..."
She did a quick check up to analyze and evaluate where to search.

She first went for the desk, drawers then random small boxes, but nothing special in sight (apart of some funny weird stalker photos here and there that made her laugh).
"Uhmm... Is it possible that Bakura really didn't have the Millenium Heart ?", Rebecca started to have doubt.
It's only then that she notice a quite discreet chest in a corner of the bedroom, behind some mess.

"Uh ?..." she stepped to checked it.
To her surprise, it wasn't locked.
"Hmm...unlocked. Bakura, you should be more careful with your stuff !" she thought.

Inside the chest, shining slightly in a slow and calm pace, a golden heart-shape ("real" kind of human heart shape) was laying.
"The Millenium Heart !!" Rebecca said not without excitement of her find.
"Damn, he wasn't lying at all ! It truly exists !"
She was as surprised to see that Bakura's story was real as to noticed how poorly hidden it was and how easily she could find it, at the end.

Like a real heart, the mysterious item seemed to beat inside. A slow regular beat coming from inside.
It didn't looked like an "evil" item though.

But Rebecca wasn't stupid, she planned on rigorously study it before doing anything with it.

Thus, she quickly try to think of something to wrap the golden Millenium item in it, but she didn't had thought of taking something with her before her housebreaking.
So she undressed her thin pink jacket and wrapped the Millenium item around it.

Unfortunately, it wasn't stable enough and the quite big item was slipping through holes.
"Damn..."
Rebecca thought again ...
She needed more material, she could steal some of Bakura's clothes but didn't want to left more evidence of her unwelcomed "visit".
"No choice..." she concluded.

In order to filled the holes in the wrapping, she slowly removed her bra and her panties from under her skirt.
She successfully filled and stabilized the wrapping with them.

"<sigh>... Ok, let's go now" she took the Millenium Heart covered and wrapped inside her clothes with both hands.
Rebecca quickly went back to the window.
"Better watch out now. I don't want people to get a pick at my uncovered lady parts..."
She said before jumping down from the window and into the street as she felt a thin breeze going through her skirt and into her delicate female genitals.

She fell loudly onto the tool shed, then on the floor, right on her small butt.
"AOUCH !"

Quickly recovering herself, the blond girl sped up to her own house and bedroom, and immediately started to unwrap the Millenium Heart to further examining it.

It was still beating and shinning with a discreet golden light...
The girl was lost contemplating it...

Then ...

1/ Rebecca notices some tiny golden dust has recovered the clothes (her pink jacket, panties and bra) she had previously wrapped the Millenium Heart into.
2/ Rebecca accidentally touches directly the Millenium Heart.
3/ Decides to go on search in the Internet before anything to make sure of the best use she can do with it.
114311221.title: Rebecca's discovery ...

choices: 20 hours later, the following day, Rebecca wakes up dizzy from a long sleep
1143112212.content:
The golden Millenium heart was there beating and pumping like an organic real heart.
The mystical object slightly glowing a sparkling a little warming light, like a small candle on a winter night.
Rebecca couldn't explained it, but the magic item irradiated something powerful, yet very peaceful and appealing.

An irresistible desire to touch it seized the petite blond girl.
She realized the strange attraction the Millenium heart was having on her, but couldn't fought it.
Not that she really wanted to, her curiosity overweighting her attention.

Rebecca quickly looked around to find something to wrap her hand with.
She didn't wanted to touch the mysterious item directly. At least not on a first contact.

She spotted a thin piece of tissue and took it with the tips of her fingers.
The blond girl approached slowly the beating golden heart with it, then place the tissue on the heart.

"OUUUCH!!", As soon as the thin tissue touched the item, a great heat nearly burnt the tip of her fingers.
Even covered by the tissue, she could feel an intense heat emanating from the Millenium item.
She didn't expected that.
The pain and her reflex made her drop the tissue and moved her hand away as quick as possible.

She looked at her index.
The area around her nail was nearly burnt.
Inadvertently, tiny bit of her hand had directly touched the item.

"Aaaah ! Damn it stings like hell ! Aah!" she grumbled. "What an idiot !" she blamed herself.
The burning was quite painful, she quickly put some water on the injured part of her fingers.

It barely calmed down the pain.
Moreover, she started to feel warm, really warm, like the heat was invading her whole body from the burning tips of her hand.
"Dammit, i'm not feeling good."

Rebecca rapidly felt dizzy, and a few second later, she was sweating like after an intense sport exercise session (which, for the small blond US girl, didn't represent much activity since she wasn't really the athlete kind of girl).
"Oh, no, this isn't good. This isn't good at all...", she said as she panicked.
The blond realized her urge of curiosity might have put her on great trouble, if not danger.

Things were getting blurred for Rebecca.
She picked a glance at the Millenium Heart, it was moving.
She didn't knew if she was hallucinating, but she saw the Millenium Heart slowly but surely glowing more and more from a blinding light and getting smaller in the same time, like a little-sized dying star.
"God, What i've done ?..."
The Millenium Heart was slowly evaporating into tiny flying dust.
These dust were moving in direction of Rebecca, which was as intrigued as frightened by what was happening in front of her eyes.
But she was like under a powerful fever, so weakened, she could only watched, helpless.

As the bright Millenium heart was disappearing into tiny particles, it seemed that this dust were gathering and moving in direction of Rebecca's hand, then her chest.
It was like her body was sucking it.

"What this thing is doing ? Is this somekind of vaporous bomb trap or something ?! Oh, bloody hell, why did I have to make contact with it ?!"

She followed the movement of the dust carefully with her eyes until she noticed it entering her body around the rib cage.
"This thing is penetrating my body ?!!"

If her scientific interest were partly controlling her emotions before, the young girl was now completely panicking, starting to cry and yell at a power she wasn't understanding and was overwhelming her.
"Get away from me !! Get away from me!!", she cried, shouting at the thing as like it was an intelligible entity with its proper willpower.

The dust absorbed by her chest made the heat inside her going even more higher.
The golden Millenium Heart was now entirely disintegrated into tiny particle.
It was only when a few of it were remaining, not yet sucked by her body, that she lost the fight against the magical fever, and fell from her chair, fainted ...
1143112212.title: Rebecca accidentally touches the Millenium Heart

choices: She goes to the Doctor to see if there's any trace of the Millenium Heart in her
She tries to figure out herself if she really had absorbed the Millenium Heart
As she tries to get answers, something happens to her body by accident
As she tries to get answers, something happens to somebody else body by accident
11431122121.content:
~~~~~
Dark, cold, empty ...
Everything was black.
Laid down on the floor, fainted, Rebecca's mind waked up wandering into dark limbo.
All around her, darkness, she was surrounded by an endless void, silent and cold.
She couldn't even see her own body...
Even if she wasn't conscious yet she had passed out, her rational mind told her she was dreaming at the moment.
Yet, her inner self wasn't reassured much.

Blind in this void, the small blond girl's mind turned around, paying attention to any sign of activity, her breath as the only sound she could hear, echoing into infinity.

She was starting to get worried when she heard a voice, an unidentified feminine voice.

"Don't think it makes you better than any of us..."

Rebecca, startled, turned around, doing a 360°.
She hoped to see something, but nothing, she was still seeing eternal blackness all around her.

"Don't you feel this forbidden power?..."
Said the same voice, speaking in a soft monotome emotionless tone.
<<Who (or what) was that? Is that voice speaking tome?>>, asked the nerdy girl to herself.
She turned again, all around.
Behind her, before her, on her left, right, from above and under.
It seemed like the voice was coming from everywhere at the same time.

Rebecca tried to interact with it.
"Uh, hello? Dear voice in my head. I'm pretty sure you've much thing interesting to tell, but it doesn't makes any sense right now.
Lets just wake me up, okay?"

Nobody answered her but the eternal silence of the void surrounding her.

Several seconds passed...

"You must be proud, aren't you? This forbidden power you stole... Banished... Corrupted... Not for the unworthy humans... Impure. The dark knowledge..."
said the deep feminine voice.

Another voice appeared, a man voice, deeper, older, echoed, further away, repeating the same words, like a mantra.
"Corrupted... Banished...Created by the blood... Powered by envy... Filled with lust and greed... Impure emotions... Impure emotions"

Just a bunch of seconds later, another voice, appeared as well, and started repeated the same prayer, at the same pace and monotony.
"Corrupted... Banished...
Created by the blood...
Powered by envy...
Filled with lust and greed...
Impure emotions... Impure emotions"

Rebecca was confused...
"Great... Now I'm hearing some religious weirdos recite some creepy prayers... I've probably watched too much horror movie... This is really a creepy weird dream...
Can't I have at least some light or something?"

But the blond girl still had no kind of response from the 3 voices.

She suddenly heared a creepy maniac laugh that made her jumped with surprise, like one of those creepy clowns from fictions or bad prankers.
"Hiahaha... Dream... Dream !... This isn't a dream! NOT A DREAM!"

"... the hell?", the blond girl shouted out, more annoyed than frightened.

The calm feminine voice spoke again, still deep and soft but with a slight accusing tone this time
- Lust, sex... the forbidden powers to abuse people... for your carnal greed... Your true-self... You're a sleazy slut, aren't you?"

"Heyy! What??!" shouted out the blond girl to the voice into the darkness of her mind, kinda upsetted to be just insulted like that, from a voice in her head, from herself, as she believed.

Suddenly, as all the voices suddenly ended, she heard a last bunch of voices.
These voices were echoing into the darkness as well as the previous ones, but she could directly identified them this time.

"No, Rebecca! Don't! Please! I'm begging you! I don't want to be crushed! Please, forgive me! Nooo!" said a young feminine voice, clearly in terror.

<<Téa?!...>>, said the nerdy blond to herself, surprised, as she recognized the voice of her brunette rival.
But she hadn't much time to think about the meaning of this, that she heared another voice.
A soft but male voice. A voice that had a special place in her heart, seemingly in pain, or effort, the blond girl, having only her ears in this darkness, couldn't tell.

"Nnnggghh... Please Rebecca, stop! This is too big... You're making me way too BIG! *grunt*"

<<Yugi?!>>

"Yeah, my sweet lover, I gonna make you big, REALLY BIG... BIG and STRONG for your tit-queen!"

<<Wait?! This... Wasn't this was my own voice??...>>

"Rebecca?... What are you doing?... Rebecca?!...", this was Mai's voice.
"What is happening?! My boobs! My big boobs!... Rebecca?! Please, stop!"

Rebecca was trying to figure the meaning of all this, but it simply hadn't any sense to her.
She heard her own voice again. A voice in which she could hear malice, evil desire and jubilation.

"There is no escape, Mai! They're all mine now!"

"Okay, enough bullshit! Wake up, Rebecca. This is way too weird!" Rebecca yelled out loud. Weird dream or not, whatever it was, the girl wanted to wake up right now.

The nerdy girl focused as much as she could to get away from whatever place her mind was.
Suddenly, piercing the darkness, a bright blinding light emerged from nowhere.
A gold-colored light that surprised the girl and invaded the void before exploding into millions of shiny tiny dust of gold.
And from there, in front of Rebecca, softly appeared in the horizon a giant golden Heart.

"The Millenium Heart?", exclaimed the petite girl, looking at this enormous Heart, standing in all impressiveness in the void, pulsing from a deep and mesmerizing pulse.
Even if she considered all this a trick of her mind, she was still in awe at this image.
It then struck her like a bolt of lightning : "The Millenium Heart !"
and she suddenly remembered that she was manipulating it, before she passed out.

But before she thought more about her situation, she felt herself sucked up. Sucked up by the giant golden heart.
"Wooooow!", yelled out the poor girl, completely defenseless.
Her whole body was feeling like she was swallowed by a giant black hole.
She cried as much as she could, but no sound came out of her mouth, and in less than a second, her entire body was dispatched into the giant golden Heart, its pulse being so loud from here she felt she was going to get deaf.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

"AAAAAAAAAAH!"
...
...
*BOOM*
...

As one of the biggest scream she ever made left her lung, followed by a loud noise of a heavy object hurting a hard surface,
Rebecca felt a pain at the top of her forehead.
"Aouch!"

The heavy object, it was her head and the hard surface, her bedroom's floor.
She heard a woman voice not so far away talking to her:
"What's that noise? Why are the crying?! Are you okay sweetie ?"
It was Rebecca's aunt voice.
Rebecca grumbled.
"Damn gravity..."

She tried to open her eyes, but where she expected to see recognizable element of her everyday life,
she was welcomed by a big mass of black and white fluffy hair covering her sight.

"Meeoow?..." lengthily expressed to the small blond girl that same mass of fluffy black and white hair
Rebecca grumbled again at a sound she recognized as well.
"Gaaa... Get away of my face, Kibble!"

She pushed away vigorously, but still softly, Kibble, the maybe too-affectionate cat of her aunt.

Opening her eyes, she recognized her bedroom, and particularly the carpet she was laid on, like pancake flattened on a floor, at the feet of her bed.
"Long time I haven't got such a wake-up...Uurrgh.."
The blond girl rubbed at the freshly made bump on her head.

"Meeoow?..."
Kibble rubbed again his body to Rebecca's side, now sat on the floor.
"Craving for attention, uh?... We should have named Téa, ahah...", she laughed at her bad witticism...
She gave the demanding cat a few caress.
"...Or Rebecca... It would be valid as well...", the girl mumbled.

She looked around, like she wasn't 100% to be in the real world, before concluding :
"So... Was all this just a dream?...", she wondered out loud... "Well, that was a creepy one..."

She tried to rethink of the passed day.
She didn't remembered going to bed.
"Wait, wasn't I studying that Millenium Heart ?"
"We were the afternoon. And now it's 11:00 a.m... Did I really slept for more than 20 hours??!"
"And where is the Millenium Heart, by the way?..."
Many questions jostled in her head.
She then remembered the event of the passed day : "The Millenium Heart!"
Rebecca looked all around her but couldn't find it.
"I remember it was there. But when i touched it, it... like... entered... in me?"

Welcome to the universe of Yu-Gi-Oh!.
A universe of powerful magic where everything can happen.
Magic cards, Millenium items, Kaiba Corp's virtual world simulator, powerful magic devices and more are about to induce some wonderful event and things are about to become weird and kinky for our heroes.

(*) Téa, Alexis, Akiza, Luna, Tori, Yuzu, all ladies and even female duel monsters may discover what crazy things science and magic can do (especially to themselves). Their world are about to get some changes and they surely might enjoy it ...

But first, which of our cute and lovely Yu-Gi-Oh!'s girls will go through "big" event ?

Choose your main character (**) ...



(*) : For simplification, all characters will be named by their english name (in case of a japanese name and a differing english name for example). If you don't know the english name of a specific character, please check on Yu-Gi-Oh!'s wikia all around the web.

(**) : Yu-Gi-Oh! series contain a large number of female characters. For easier browsing and readability the choices between them will be split around the serie they (mainly) appeared in.

choices: Yu-Gi-Oh! ---- crossover ---- the real world actually
154.content:
These special story paths are where the Yu-Gi-Oh! series join other universes of any kind (video game, movie, anime, whatever people can imagine).

Here, Yu-Gi-Oh! series can crossover everything, and even themselves (to say, characters from different timeline in Yu-Gi-Oh! can meet eachother, for example Téa Gardner from the first series and Yuya Sakaki from Arc-V. Even if technically they're not from the same decade at all).

Even though the story can (or will) takes place in a different universe or mixed-universe, the only rule is that it should still and always focus on the Yu-Gi-Oh! characters (and not divert to only the other universe characters).
We are still in a YGO interactive story after all.

The other rules still apply here. :)

Have fun !
So, which crossover will happen ?

choices: YGO's characters "naturally" live in FF7 world

154133311.content:
In this cross-over, characters from Yu-Gi-Oh! (the first series), like Téa Gardner, Mai Valentine, Rebecca Hawkins, Yugi Muto, Joey and Serenity Wheeler will encounter the world of Final Fantasy 7.

Let's now decide how all this happen(see author's notes below) and at which time of the Final Fantasy 7's world the story takes place.

Author's note :
- Naturally VS causes :

You can choice wheter all Yu-Gi-Oh's characters naturally appeared(*) in FF7 world or if their existence inside FF7 world has been caused by an event(**).

* : In that case you can then either choose that they always lived in this world as independent person. OR, you can decide that they "ARE" an already existing character in this world. (for example, in this story path, Téa Gardner could appear to be Tifa Lockhart, Yugi Muto to be Cloud Strife, Serenity to be Aeris, Yuffie --> Rebecca, etc ...)

*² : In that case, you can decide of any event. Like a sudden magic teleportation of the characters inside FF7 world. Or if someone caused YGO characters to become characters of FF7, etc...
154133311.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! meet Final Fantasy VII

choices: It's Téa Gardner (and she's just really Téa Gardner)
It's Téa "Lockhart" Gardner (i.e : she's the incarnation of Tifa Lockhart)
1541333111.content:
Anxious Heart ...
It was another moribund and quiet day in Midgar.
Another day in the simple life of the Midgar's slum's inhabitants.
So many of them living in poverty, struggling nearly every day for a decent life, but just dealing with it.
Because they could, because they actually never had the choice, or simply because that's all they knew...

Born underneath the richer population, raised in the sky-less slum and dying there, the city's unfortunates and downtrodden brave the hardness of life with little things with a honorable, yet resigned, temper.

Of course, life was much different for people living in the actual city above, for middle class and higher class people, minding their business, oblivious about the less lucky people living underneath them, because they weren't aware or because they simply didn't want to care.

Midgar was a city split in 2, as literaly as figuratively, with 2 different kind of life depending on where one was born.

Here, on the lower parts of the big city, the low-class people, those who actually had a job were mostly working for the ShinRa company, at the Mako reactor as laborer or such ... Hard and exhausting jobs not even well paid.

Somewhere there, in the lower part of the big city, after another long, boring or sad day, some people hanged around at a little, modest and simple yet welcoming bar, the "7th Heaven".

Inside it, many people... some of them trying to drown the gloominess of their life on alcohol, some other trying to enjoy simple time around a drink and friends, and a few other just to enjoy the sweetness or the bartender and female owner...

It was 19:10.
There, around a side of the bar, a young lady was standing minding her business ...
1541333111.title: YGO's characters "naturally" live i...

15413331112.content:
165cm (5 feet 4 inches) tall,
clear blue eyes, brown/dark brown hair, and an angelic face,
long firm legs and a cute bubble ass under a black leather skin-tight miniskirt
big juicy (naturals ?...) DD cup breasts bouncing in a white tank top that let visible a toned and flat belly,
an overall hourglass figure emphasised by her impressive bossom,
and finally a sweet and charming smile,
the young woman was an astonishing beauty queen.

It was Téa "Lockhart" Gardner, the cute and nice young bartender of the bar.
Around the neighborhood, she was quite popular, and not only because of her nice personality ... (as many could guess).
Her really impressive and sexy appearance had always allured many male, with tits really big and perfectly round jutting proudly from her slim frame.
An amazing asset that also always made some people wondered if her big round jugs were actually "real".
Téa knew it well, and make good use of her appearance for her advantage on some occasions, but never boasted about it.
Neither did she answered to these suspicion about the "natural" of her big tits with something else than just a smile.
The brunette would never admit it by modesty, but was proud of her sexy breasts.

The girl wasn't a pure Midgar product, Téa was from a less famous town called Nibelheim and moved at Midgar several years ago, opening her own business there.
She also got there in order to try to find, maybe, her old love Yugi "Strife" Muto, a blond guy with strange spikey hair who was also her childhood friend. By the time, she managed to find him, as some other people and new acquaintance and friends during many adventures around Gaïa.

So here she was, handing drinks to customers on a platter, her body flaunting her beautiful DD cup globes bouncing with every step.

This night was a busy night, there were more customers than usual, even for a friday night.
"Business are going well tonight ..." thought the girl. Though, she also thought it could be, maybe, even better...
